page.title: 02TOURISM IN MINEHEAD
page.content: Minehead has a range of accommodation from boarding houses offering bed and breakfast to hotels offering a wide range of facilities. Some people only stay overnight whilst touring the West Country,while others use Minehead as a base for a week or more.The majority of visitors come by car and use it to explore the hills,moors and places of interest. Local coach firms,fishing boats, hovercraft,a paddlesteamer and the privately owned railway offer excursions for the visitor. In Minehead there are beaches, amusements and games fot the children, with shops and walks for the adults. Quaint villages and places of historic interest are to be found within a short drive from Minehead.
